greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of f(x, x^3) * f(x^2, x^7) in powers of x where f(, ) is Ramanujan's general theta function.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Michael Somos, Introduction to Ramanujan theta functions
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Ramanujan Theta Functions
mathematica: a[ n_] := SeriesCoefficient[ (1/2) x^(-1/8) EllipticTheta[ 2, 0, x^(1/2)] QPochhammer[ -x^2, x^9] QPochhammer[ -x^7, x^9] QPochhammer[ x^9], {x, 0, n}];
program: (PARI) {a(n) = if( n<0, 0, sumdiv(36*n + 17, d, kronecker(-4, d)) / 2)};
results.author: _Michael Somos_, Jan 29 2017
